mapper.sql: type, url, parent_id, parent_ids, permission_name, permission_value, status_id, create_time, update_time, sort_no, icon, is_parent
per.id, per.type, per.url, per.parent_id, per.parent_ids, per.permission_name, per.permission_value, per.status_id, per.create_time, per.update_time, per.sort_no, per.icon, per.is_parent
mapper.select:
select , from sys_permission
ORDER BY ${pager.sort} ${pager.order} LIMIT #{pager.offset}, #{pager.limit}

select distinct
from sys_permission per LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission rolePer ON per.id = rolePer.permission_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role userRole on rolePer.role_id = userRole.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user user on user.id = userRole.user_id where user.id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_permission (id, type, url, parent_id, parent_ids, permission_name, permission_value, status_id, create_time, update_time, sort_no, icon, is_parent) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parentIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permissionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permissionValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sortNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isParent,jdbcType=BIT})

update sys_permission
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, type = #{record.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{record.url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{record.parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, parent_ids = #{record.parentIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permission_name = #{record.permissionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permission_value = #{record.permissionValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status_id = #{record.statusId,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sort_no = #{record.sortNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, icon = #{record.icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_parent = #{record.isParent,jdbcType=BIT},

update sys_permission set type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, parent_ids = #{parentIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permission_name = #{permissionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permission_value = #{permissionValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status_id = #{statusId,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sort_no = #{sortNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_parent = #{isParent,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
